languages.text: "Храбрый еретик не лучше трусливого. А это то, кем он был — еретиком и мерзостью".
"A brave heretic is no better than a craven one. And that is what he was: a heretic and an abomination."
languages.original_text: "Храбрый еретик не лучше трусливого. А это то, кем он был — еретиком и мерзостью".

traits.locale_text: "A brave heretic is no better than a cowardly one. And that's what he was, a heretic and an abomination."
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

traits.locale_text: "A brave heretic is no better than a cowardly one. And that's what he was, a heretic and an abomination."
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: «Un hereje valiente es tan malo como uno cobarde. Y eso es lo que era: un hereje y una abominación».
languages.original_text: "A brave heretic is no better than a craven one. And that is what he was: a heretic and an abomination."

traits.locale_text: «Un hereje valiente es tan malo como uno cobarde. Y eso es lo que era: un hereje y una abominación».
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: 「勇敢な異端者は、臆病な異端者に劣る。そして彼はどうかというと、異端の忌まわしき者なのです」
languages.original_text: "A brave heretic is no better than a craven one. And that is what he was: a heretic and an abomination."

traits.locale_text: 「勇敢な異端者は、臆病な異端者に劣る。そして彼はどうかというと、異端の忌まわしき者なのです」
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: “无论是勇敢还是懦弱，异端分子就是异端分子。他就是这样的家伙——一个异端分子，一个怪物。”
languages.original_text: "A brave heretic is no better than a craven one. And that is what he was: a heretic and an abomination."

traits.locale_text: “无论是勇敢还是懦弱，异端分子就是异端分子。他就是这样的家伙——一个异端分子，一个怪物。”
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: "Ein mutiger Ketzer ist keinen Deut besser als ein feiger. Und genau das war er: Ein Ketzer und ein Monstrum."
languages.original_text: "A brave heretic is no better than a craven one. And that is what he was: a heretic and an abomination."

traits.locale_text: "Ein mutiger Ketzer ist keinen Deut besser als ein feiger. Und genau das war er: Ein Ketzer und ein Monstrum."
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: « Un hérétique, aussi brave soit-il, reste un hérétique. Et c'est ce qu'il était : un hérétique et une abomination. »
languages.original_text: "A brave heretic is no better than a craven one. And that is what he was: a heretic and an abomination."

traits.locale_text: « Un hérétique, aussi brave soit-il, reste un hérétique. Et c'est ce qu'il était : un hérétique et une abomination. »
traits.speaker: MasterofDiscipline

languages.text: "Cesur bir kâfir, ödlek bir kâfirden daha iyi değildir. O da tam olarak buydu: Bir kâfir ve ucube."
languages.original_text: "A brave heretic is no better than a craven one. And that is what he was: a heretic and an abomination."
